title: BRIEF-Callidus Capital Says Receipt Of Interim Court Order On Braslyn Plan Of Arrangement
text:
BRIEF-Callidus Capital Says Receipt Of Interim Court Order On Braslyn Plan Of Arrangement

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 17, 2019 23:50)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Callidus Capital Says Receipt Of Interim Court Order On Braslyn Plan Of Arrangement Sept 17 (Reuters) - Callidus Capital Corp : * CALLIDUS CAPITAL ANNOUNCES RECEIPT OF INTERIM COURT ORDER * INTERIM ORDER PROVIDES THAT A SPECIAL MEETING OF HOLDERS OF CALLIDUS' COMMON SHARES MAY BE HELD ON OCTOBER 23 * CALLIDUS CAPITAL - ONTARIO SUPERIOR COURT GRANTED INTERIM ORDER ON VARIOUS MATTERS IN CONNECTION TO CO'S PREVIOUS ANNOUNCED PLAN OF DEAL WITH BRASLYN * ORDER PROVIDES FOR SPECIAL MEETING TO CONSIDER CO'S PLAN OF ARRANGEMENT WITH BRASLYN LTD

BRIEF-Callidus Capital Says Receipt Of Interim Court Order On Braslyn Plan Of Arrangement
description: BRIEF-Callidus Capital Says Receipt Of Interim Court Order On Braslyn Plan Of Arrangement
